name: Mary Lou Jepsen
description: Mary Lou Jepsen is a globally known technology pioneer. She is CEO & founder of Openwater. Previously she was co-founder & CTO of One Laptop per Child ($100 laptop), Executive Director of Engineering at Facebook/Oculus, Director of Engineering at Google reporting to Sergey Brin,  CTO of Intel's Display Division, and an MIT professor.  She has over 300 patents.  She has received numerous global awards including being named to Time Magazine's 100 Most Influential People.
